sense.gloss: seeing for the first time, first sight, first meeting

sdata.j: ↑簡単↑↓かんたん↓な↑曲↑↓きょく↓なら|↑初↑↓しょ↓↑見|↑↓けん↓で↑歌↑↓うた↓えます。
sdata.e: If it's a simple tune, I can sight-sing it.

sdata.j: ↑簡単↑↓かんたん↓な↑曲↑↓きょく↓なら|↑初↑↓しょ↓↑見|↑↓けん↓で↑歌↑↓うた↓えます。
sdata.e: If it's a simple piece of music, I can sight-sing it.

sdata.j: ↑音大↑↓おんだい↓↑生↑↓せい↓はみんな|↑初見|↑↓しょけん↓とか↑即興↑↓そっきょう↓とか↑得意↑↓とくい↓なの？
sdata.e: Can all university music students do things like sight reading and improvisation?
